# kvlm-timeline-item

Displays a single timeline item with its given title, timestamp and text.

## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Modifiers | Type         | Default    |
|----------|-----------|-----------|--------------|------------|
| `date`   | `date`    |           | `Date`       |            |
| `role`   | `role`    | readonly  | `"listitem"` | "listitem" |
| `title`  | `title`   |           | `string`     |            |
